item.title: Is Zohran Mamdani a Lifelong Socialist?
item.description: The New York City mayoral candidate is trying to soft-sell his radicalism.

item.title: Blow Up Washington, D.C.’s Brutalist Buildings — and the Sooner, the Better
item.description: They are a tribute to soulless monumentality and a gut punch to the human spirit.

item.title: Schools Are Erasing America’s Story. Parents Must Rescue It
item.description: America is drifting into collective amnesia regarding our history. That indifference isn’t accidental.

item.title: The Obergefell Slippery Slope Was Real
item.description: There was a germ of radicalism even in arguments for gay marriage that presented themselves as conservative.

item.title: Democracy in the Workplace Is Under Threat
item.description: Minorities of workers are choosing union representation for 100 percent of their colleagues. This is against the spirit of the law.
